plot: Nick and Hank look into the death of a priest, who was performing an exorcism on a 9-year-old boy. Is the boy a Wesen or possessed by a demon?

Nick (David Giuntoli) faces his toughest challenge yet when he and Hank (Russell Hornsby) investigate a case that combines religious phenomenon with the dark dealings of the Wesen Council. Meanwhile, Rosalee (Bree Turner) is torn when Nick's case challenges her Wesen loyalties. Elsewhere, Captain Renard (Sasha Roiz) leaves town to tend to some "family matters."—Anonymous

While Monsignor Paul Dobbs attempts an exorcism, he's killed and seminary student Matthew Bard wounded by a 'demon'. Nick finds the possessed pre-teen boy, Daniel Keary, hiding in a sacristy closet. Reporting what he hears from the desperate parents and witnessed in hospital to Monroe, Nick must hear the conclusion: it's a satanic semi-feral creature, which grows from normal boy into a worse monster then any feral, hence the council of elders has strict procedures for that kind's timely elimination. Meanwhile captain Renard leaves incognito for Vienna, to see to the royal throne fight.—KGF Vissers
